Bio

I'm a postdoctoral researcher at Johns Hopkins University, working with Professor Alison L. Hill.

I completed my physics PhD at Harvard University in May 2020, doing research on ultracold quantum gases in the Greiner lab.

    Presented at American Transplant Conference 2022 in Boston, MA: Years of life gained through organ transplantation from donors deceased from drug overdose
